# xpc_activity_state_t

**Type Alias**

A type that represents the state of an activity.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias xpc_activity_state_t = Int
```

## Discussion

An activity is in one of the states that [doc://com.apple.xpc/documentation/XPC/xpc_activity_state_t] defines. Apps may check the current state of the activity using [doc://com.apple.xpc/documentation/XPC/xpc_activity_get_state(_:)] in the handler block that you provide to [doc://com.apple.xpc/documentation/XPC/xpc_activity_register(_:_:_:)].

The app can modify the state of the activity by calling [doc://com.apple.xpc/documentation/XPC/xpc_activity_set_state(_:_:)] with one of the following:

- [doc://com.apple.xpc/documentation/XPC/XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_DEFER]
- [doc://com.apple.xpc/documentation/XPC/XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_CONTINUE]
- [doc://com.apple.xpc/documentation/XPC/XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_DONE]

## State

- **xpc_activity_get_state(_:)**: Returns the current state of an activity.
- **xpc_activity_set_state(_:_:)**: Updates the current state of an activity.
- **xpc_activity_should_defer(_:)**: Tests whether to defer an activity.
- **xpc_activity_state_t**: A type that represents the state of an activity.
- **XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_CHECK_IN**: The activity has completed a check-in with the system.
- **XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_WAIT**: The activity is waiting for an opportunity to run.
- **XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_RUN**: The activity is eligible to run according to its criteria.
- **XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_DEFER**: The activity needs to wait until it satisfies its criteria again.
- **XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_CONTINUE**: The activity continues its operation beyond the return of its handler block.
- **XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_DONE**: The activity is complete.
